title: The Next New Champion Has To Be...
body: Yasuo's counter. I mean nobody directly counters yasuo as considering abilities and the overall kit. playstyle. etc. no matter who you are you will not have an easy time against a competent yasuo early game or mid game.

replies.body:
Yasuo gets absolutely destroyed by Fiora, Garen, Darius, Ryze, Lee Sin... the list goes on and on. Malphite. Leblanc.

New champions are created creatively by art and gameplay style--their priority is to heighten the quality of the game, not just to counter a Yasuo. Yasuo is very strong right now, sure, but he's not broken. You don't just play against the champion, you play against the player behind it.

Just pick {{champion:7}}  or {{champion:99}}  in to {{champion:157}}  every time assuming your the one getting to counter pick him. After that proceed to laugh all game as he rages you through all chat because the champs you picked against him are broke or op.

{{champion:80}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:238}} etc.

You're just pretty bad at playing against Yasuo
